attributes.action: STOP Wellingborough Driving Test Centre at Glamis Hall from Closing
attributes.background:
DVSA have issued a termination notice to Glamis Hall meaning no more driving tests in Wellingborough after 11-04-2019.
We urge the DVSA to continue to serve our Community by withdrawing the closure notice and continue to Test in Wellingborough.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
